https://ohmyveggies.com/30-minute-vegeta.description: A streamlined version of pho with a simple ginger broth base and shiitake mushrooms to make it meatless!

ingredients: 1 tbsp fresh ginger, peeled and grated (or ¼ teaspoon ground ginger)
1 ounces rice noodles (cooked according to package instructions)
Fresh cilantro, basil, lime wedges, hoisin sauce, and chili garlic sauce or sriracha
64 ounces homemade or low-sodium vegetable broth
1 ounces rice noodles (cooked according to package instructions)
Fresh cilantro, basil, lime wedges, hoisin sauce, and chili garlic sauce or sriracha
instructions_list: In a large pot, combine the vegetable broth, green onion, grated ginger, and salt. Bring to a full boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes.
While the broth is cooking, melt the butter in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and sauté for about 6 minutes, or until tender, stirring frequently.
Stir in the hoisin and sesame oil and cook until the sauce thickens and coats the mushrooms, about 1 minute more. Remove from heat.

Divide the rice noodles between four to six large bowls, then fill each bowl with the ginger broth. Add bean sprouts, sliced jalapeños, shiitake mushrooms, fresh basil, and cilantro and serve with lime wedges, hoisin, and chili garlic sauce.
https://ohmyveggies.com/30-minute-vegeta.title: 30-Minute Vegetarian Pho

https://www.healingtomato.com/beet-lemon.description: Turn your boring lemonade into a colorful pink lemonade by using fresh beets. This fancy beet lemonade is very easy to make any time.

ingredients: ⅛ cup raw cane sugar (or to taste)
1/8 cup raw cane sugar (or to taste)
instructions_list: Juice all the lemons and limes
Place the diced beets in a wire strainer over a bowl
In a jug, add the beet juice, sugar water, lemon and lime juice
Pour the liquid over the beets
Empty the bowl into the pitcher
https://www.healingtomato.com/beet-lemon.title: Beet Lemonade

https://www.acouplecooks.com/roasted-del.author: Sonja Overhiser

ingredients: 2 pounds delicata squash (2 medium to large)*
2 tablespoons Mexican hot sauce (we like Cholula)
2 pounds delicata squash (2 medium to large)*
2 tablespoons Mexican hot sauce (we like Cholula)
instructions_list: Wash the squash. Cut it in half lengthwise, then use a spoon to scoop out the seeds. Cut each half into 1/2-inch half-moon shaped slices.
Place the slices in a bowl. Mix with the olive oil, kosher salt, and plenty of fresh ground black pepper.
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Place the squash on the sheet in a single layer.
Roast for 20 to 25 minutes until tender and slightly browned. Eat immediately. (Store leftovers refrigerated and reheat in a 400°F oven.)
While the squash roasts, mix together the sauce ingredients. (Or substitute Lemon Tahini Sauce for a vegan or non-spicy option.)
Serve squash warm from the oven with the sauce.
https://www.acouplecooks.com/roasted-del.title: Delicata Squash Fries
